<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Damage / repair object.

Damage 0 means fully functional, damage 1 means completely destroyed / dead.<br>

Alias of [[setDamage]], which was introduced to fix a spelling error in this operator's name. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[setDammage]] damage </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> damage: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldier1 [[setDammage]] 1;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setDamage]], [[setVehicleArmor]], [[damage]], [[getDammage]], [[setHit]], [[getHit]], [[getHitIndex]], [[setHitIndex]], [[getHitPointDamage]], [[setHitPointDamage]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<dd class="note">In '''OFP''', setting a unit's damage to a negative value will set it is health to full, but impair their aim.
